alert.note: Alert for Brown; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 7:30PM CDT until June 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BROWN AND SOUTHEASTERN COLEMAN COUNTIES... At 730 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bangs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lake Brownwood around 740 PM CDT. Brownwood around 745 PM CDT. Camp Bowie around 750 PM CDT. Early around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Whon, Owens, Indian Creek and Shields. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
